title: Publish an Agency's Annual Report
description: A public agency is ready to publish its annual financial report to its website for public access.

tasks.description: Compile the final, approved annual report document.
tasks.expected_outcome: The communications director has the final PDF of the report.

tasks.description: Ensure the document is in a web-accessible format (e.g., tagged PDF).
tasks.expected_outcome: The director confirms the PDF meets accessibility standards.

tasks.description: Upload and publish the report to the agency's public website.
tasks.expected_outcome: The director successfully posts the report online.
